admission_requirements.program_name: Master of Science in Computer Science

eligibility_criteria.academic_background: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.

required_documents: Official transcripts from all previous institutions
English proficiency test scores (for international applicants - TOEFL/IELTS)

admission_requirements.program_name: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature

eligibility_criteria.standardized_tests: SAT or ACT scores (if applicable for the country of origin)

required_documents: High school diploma or equivalent certificate
Two letters of recommendation from teachers
Proof of English proficiency (for international applicants - TOEFL/IELTS)
